description:
What Australian researchers are calling the first survey on children and the spread of COVID-19 in the classroom is turning heads in Canada.

The preliminary data, which has not yet been peer reviewed, suggests kids in Australia are not so-called superspreaders as they're frequently called by epidemiologists when it comes to influenza.

In fact, the report suggests they're not very good at spreading the coronavirus at all. 
#covid #covid19 #coronavirus #endthelockdown #endtheshutdown #reopencanada #stopid2020 #truth #willnotstaysilent #saynotobillgates #fordnation #informedconsent
